# Tender Notice: Indicator, Liquid Quantity

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: `cb-829-41114195`
* **Solicitation Number**: `W8485-258443/A`
* **Publication Date**: `2024-11-08`
* **Tender Closing Date**: `2024-12-13T14:00:00`

## Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: `2024-12-13`
* **Expected Contract End Date**: `2025-03-31`
* **Contract Value**: To be determined
* **Delivery Address**: 25 CFSD Montreal, Canada

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Item Specifications

* **Item 1**: Indicator, Liquid Quantity (Part No.: 50C-0022-1, NCAGE: 19062)
* **Quantity**: 6 units
* **Unit of Issue**: Each

## Bidding Instructions

* Bidders are encouraged to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence (DGAEPM)
* **Contact Name**: Dany Lebel
* **Contact Email**: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: (000) 000-0000
* **Contact Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

## Document Attachments

* The tender notice and bid solicitation document can be downloaded from the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51400/w8485-258443a-indicator-liquid-quantity-rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51400/w8485-258443a-indicator-liquid-quantity-rfp.pdf)
